name: Lapp Knife Antler
description: The handle of this traditional Lapp knife, also known as the leuku knife, combines Finnish curly birch with reindeer antler bone. The stainless chrome steel blade has a beautiful etched engraving with a Lappish theme. The leather sheath also reflects traditional Arctic patterns.
This leuku knife is an excellent gift idea for all those who have lost their hearts to northern nature!

properties.name: Handle material
properties.value: Finnish curly birch & reindeer antler bone
